txt.en: 'The vines were heavy with grapes all season. This vintage is sure to be of the highest quality.'
'All Elves delight in wine and song. I do not have the gift of melody, so....'
'The vineyard is in a sheltered valley to the north-west.'
'I am grateful for those who keep this land safe so I may work in peace.'
'Wine is for time of happiness, not sorrow. I hope the evil of these days passes.'
